item.title: Delta suggest?
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“puffcake, post:2, topic:250337”]if(command.startsWith(“suggest”) && playerRights > 2){
(command.substring(5));
appendToSuggestion;
sM(“Suggestion added.”);
}

made a notepad in config folder and mess around with the code[/quote]
No.

        if (command.startsWith("suggest")) {
            try {
                BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("filename.txt", true));
                String suggestion = command.substring(8);
                out.write(suggestion + "\n");
                out.close();
                sM("Suggestion added.");
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }

Or,

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:250337"] if (command.startsWith("suggest")) { String msg = command.substring(8); writeLog("["+playerName+"]: "+msg+"", "Suggestions"); sM("Your suggestion has been sent."); }[/quote]

I haven’t ever looked at Deltascape, so i don’t know the methods included.

Read full topic
